title: How We Are
description: On Kindle Vella - Coming to Kindle Unlimited Spring 2024Done with college, I finally move from Kentucky to Seattle to settle in with my boyfriend. Darius is my love, my man, my soulmate. But his best friend and roommate Arlo? It doesn't take long until he's my tension, my intrigue, my smoldering embers that just need a spark to light. I don't know where this path will take us, or what state we'll be in when we quench the flames. Is this a passing experiment, or how we are?
author: Georgie Monroe
